ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The flow of fluids and lymphocytes in the lymphatic vessels, which are concentrated from tissue fluids, into a particular lymph node. Once the fluid has transited the lymph node, it is returned to the blood via the lymphatic system._One of the two lateral margins or surfaces of a body, midway between the front and back._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
